titleStmt.title: Two tales, translated out of Ariosto: the one in dispraise of men, the other in disgrace of women. VVith certaine other Italian stanzas and prouerbs. By R.T. gentleman
titleStmt.author: Ariosto, Lodovico, 1474-1533.
Tofte, Robert, 1561-1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Valentine Sims dwelling on Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Robert Tofte, of the Italian original by Lodovico Ariosto.
Collates K-N⁴; possibly intended to follow STC 3216: Boiardo, Matteo Maria. Orlando inamorato the three first bookes.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne
